attributes.action: explain why petrol prices continue to rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
perhaps the excuse now is global warming which sees the outragous petrol prices in the u.k.now standing at 90 pence a litre 3 pounds 70 pence per gallon is an absolute disgrace when the u.s.a/ are up in arms at the petrol prices rising to $2.80 per gallon(u.s. gallon at that).With people living on a minimum wage their first days pay fills the car for the weeks travel to and from work.
Is it the intention of Government to make car ownership a rich man only privelage

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
